mapper.select:
select che.*,pro.id as sys_detail_id, pro.name as name, i.id as inquiry_id from sys_pro_detail pro LEFT JOIN inquiry i on pro.id = i.pro_detail_id LEFT JOIN quote q on i.id = q.inquiry_id LEFT JOIN sys_pro_check che on q.id = che.quote_id
q.is_active = 1 and i.is_active = 1 and pro.is_active = 1
ORDER BY time,pro.id
